claim: The Berlin Wall prevented some athletes from competing in the 1936 Summer Olympics.

supporting.text: The Berlin Wall was constructed in 1961, long after the 1936 Summer Olympics, making it impossible for it to have any effect on the event.

attacks.text: The Berlin Wall was constructed in 1961, long after the 1936 Summer Olympics, making it impossible for it to have any effect on the event.

There is no historical evidence of any significant barriers preventing athletes from competing in the 1936 Olympics.
